mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERTB( MID, MPASSWORD, MPHONE, MNAME) VALUES(#{mid},#{mpassword},#{mphone},#{mname})
mapper.select: SELECT MID FROM MEMBERTB WHERE MID=#{mid}
SELECT MID FROM MEMBERTB WHERE MID=#{mid} AND MPASSWORD=#{mpassword}
SELECT*FROM MEMBERTB ORDER BY MID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERTB SET MEMAIL=#{memail} WHERE MID=#{mid}
